sections.heading: system; powers.The system may sue or be sued in the name of the system, and in all actions brought by or against it, the system shall be represented by the Attorney General

sections.text:
81-2024.Retirement system; powers.

The system may sue or be sued in the name of the system, and in all actions brought by or against it, the system shall be represented by the Attorney General.

SourceLaws 1947, c. 211, § 11, p. 690;R.S.1943, (1978), § 60-451;Laws 1996, LB 847, § 36.
